lyrics:
18 contributorsdrinking class lyricswere up when the rooster crows

and then tomorrow

i belong to the drinking class

raise your glass

we laugh we cry we love

label me proud
see lee brice liveget tickets as low as 88you might also likei belong to the drinking class
monday through friday man
we bust our backs
if youre one of us
raise your glass

a little whiskey a little beer

ladies break out your dancing shoes
it dont matter what night it is its friday
its saturday its sunday
i just wanna hear you say
i just wanna hear you singing
yall sing it with me

we belong to the drinking class
monday through friday man
we bust our backs
